about_the_game:
Add to your Wishlist to follow this project!

Welcome to Central Bank! The ultimate Central Bank simulator!

Take control of the most fearsome weapon known to mankind: the key interest rate. As head of the central bank, you wield the power to make (or break) nations. Raise it, and watch markets crumble and riots erupt. Lower it, and brace yourself for an economy so hot it could melt steel.

Step into the all-powerful shoes of a central banker, where you hold the world’s fate at your fingertips – literally. Central Bank is about weaving the fine line between euphoric prosperity and absolute chaos:

Too high, and the people revolt as homes become unaffordable, businesses collapse, and global unrest unfolds. Too low, and inflation runs rampant, society devolves into a free-for-all, and governments beg you to reverse course. Play god with the economy, manipulate prosperity, and watch as your every choice impacts millions. Will you be the savior of stability… or the architect of economic apocalypse?

name: Central Bank

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 760

short_description: Take control of the most fearsome weapon known to mankind: the key interest rate. As head of the central bank, you wield the power to make (or break) nations. Raise it, and watch markets crumble and riots erupt. Lower it, and brace yourself for an economy so hot it could melt steel.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Dutch*, Japanese*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
